data.title: Beijing Huahai Machinery Co., Ltd.
data.text:
A trusted name

The implementation of your requirements and demands makes us what we are, helps us to live our corporate philosophy and to improve our quality on a regular basis. We consider the solutions as a totality of individual elements, which we connect in the value chain in such a way that a result tailored to the respective customer is created.

It all comes down to the right combination

In our company history, Schäfer Pumpen & Hydraulik has made a name for itself as a reliable, trustworthy company with a strong customer focus. Therefore, we continue to supply our customers with original spare parts and pumps from the history of Schäfer & Urbach and Heyer HPE Systems. At the same time, we act in a people-oriented and results-oriented manner. Many of our employees have been with us for many years and are highly regarded for their team spirit and special ethical responsibility. All our pumping systems are manufactured in our in-house workshops to high, internationally recognized standards. They are delivered to all parts of the world. To meet our high quality assurance standards, our comprehensive after-sales service is available to our customers everywhere.
